name: Traveler of Stories: Ibong Adarna
description:
Get transported to the magical world of Ibong Adarna! The result of tinkering with a strange device, you get sucked into the world of Ibong Adarna and have to figure out how to return home, but how?  The book you stumble upon in the forest seems to be the ticket out of here...

Read through the exciting story of Ibong Adarna solving puzzles all the while accompanying the main character, Don Juan as you set on the quest to capture the titular bird! Will you be clever enough to get back home?

This game was made as a capstone project.COMING SOON
